version_description:
Improved overall game performance.
Purchasable items are available to players.
Add Korean, Japanese, Italian and Vietnamese.

Optimized the game speed.
Add contact info.
Modified game assests - i.e. rockets, background, projectile, etc.
-------------------------
What's Next?
Contact us and tell us your needs, we want to hear from you.

*IMPORTANT! Data can now be saved after linking your Apple or Facebook account.
*Added the new function-’Notice‘
*Added the new tasks for free diamonds
--------------------------------------
Future updates:
* More spaceships
* Add bombs
* Add weapon descriptions, optimize weapon icons and UI to improve weapon quality differentiation
and more!
